page.title: 03AROUND THE RIVER SLEA
page.content: {WEIR There are two weirs.One which is near Cogglesford Mill,and the other which is near the new car park in Southgate. The Cogglesford Mill weir is quite large while the car park weir is small. {The River Slea} The river itself has a lot of weed at the bottom.It has a water mill called Cogglesford Mill.There are two swans that nest in the river. When the river comes to Cogglesford Mill it divides into two. {The Swimming Pool} The swimming pool which is next to the river Slea was converted into an indoor pool roughly a year ago.There is a large and a small pool.Only the large pool is covered.There are also food and drink facilities. BY I.ALVEY
